businessSemantics: Represents the detailed addresses including primary address lines.

joinSql: SELECT course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'math'

businessSemantics: The postal code for the city of Port Chelsea.
joinSql: SELECT zip_postcode FROM Addresses WHERE city = 'Port Chelsea'

businessSemantics: The department offering the highest number of degree programs.
joinSql: SELECT T2.department_name, T1.department_id FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

businessSemantics: Counts the distinct departments offering degree programs.
Counts the distinct names of degree programs offered.
The number of degrees offered by the Engineering department.
joinSql: SELECT count(*) FROM Departments AS T1 JOIN Degree_Programs AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.department_id WHERE T1.department_name = 'engineer'

businessSemantics: Names and descriptions of all course sections.

joinSql: SELECT T1.course_name, T1.course_id FROM Courses AS T1 JOIN Sections AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id GROUP BY T1.course_id HAVING count(*) <= 2

businessSemantics: The semester with the highest number of student registrations.
joinSql: SELECT T1.semester_name, T1.semester_id FROM Semesters AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.semester_id = T2.semester_id GROUP BY T1.semester_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

businessSemantics: Description of the department with 'computer' in its name.
joinSql: SELECT department_description FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%computer%'

businessSemantics: Students enrolled in Bachelor degree programs.
joinSql: SELECT DISTINCT T1.first_name, T1.middle_name, T1.last_name FROM Students AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id JOIN Degree_Programs AS T3 ON T2.degree_program_id = T3.degree_program_id WHERE T3.degree_summary_name = 'Bachelor'

businessSemantics: The degree program with the highest number of student enrollments.
joinSql: SELECT T1.degree_program_id, T1.degree_summary_name FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.degree_program_id = T2.degree_program_id GROUP BY T1.degree_program_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
